name: Botcoin
description:
Unfinished PICO-8 project for BrownieJam #3 that couldn´t finish on time.

Botcoin is a spammer simulator. You start small creating likes and follower by hand and eventually you end up having a fully automated spamming empire and becoming the Tsar of Spam!

In this unfinished prototype you can get a feel of the initial gameplay when nothing is automated. You can go to the store to buy automatic spamming software but the logic is not implemented.  Also the task system to get experience and move up in the dark net ladder is missing.

The game is mostly in Spanish with a few stuff in English.
